body.p: Examples 22–25 illustrate the requirements in paragraphs 56–58 of IFRS 15 on constraining estimates of variable consideration. In addition, the following requirements are illustrated in these examples:

li.p: paragraph 55 of IFRS 15 on refund liabilities (Example 22);
paragraphs B20–B27 of IFRS 15 on sales with a right of return (Example 22); and
paragraphs 84–86 of IFRS 15 on allocating variable consideration to performance obligations (Example 25).
